sentences: Christopher Norton (born June 22, 1953) was born in New Zealand and is a British pianist and composer.
Norton obtained a degree in music from the University of Otago in 1974.
He taught music in Wellington high schools, worked as a composer-in-schools for a year, and then freelanced as a composer, arranger and pianist.
Other recently published works include a CD-ROM, So You Wanna Be a Pop Star, tutors for electronic keyboard and guitar, and a volume in Boosey & Hawkes' Buy A Band range.
